title: Ep. 270: Essential Oils, Protein Treatments & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 270: Essential Oils, Protein Treatments & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: So, you’ve got some essential oils…what are you supposed to do with them? We have tips from an aromatherapy expert. We’re also talking about new protein treatments for your hair—and whether or not you actually need them. And there’s lots of beauty news...
description:
So, you’ve got some essential oils…what are you supposed to do with them? We have tips from an aromatherapy expert. We’re also talking about new protein treatments for your hair—and whether or not you actually need them. And there’s lots of beauty news to discuss: L’Oréal’s ban on animal-hair brushes; Thirteen Lune, a site featuring beauty brands from Black and Brown founders; Jonathan Van Ness’s new hair line; high-end sexual wellness products; and more. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
